text: The Barbón government is the incumbent regional government of Asturias led by President Adrián Barbón. It was formed in July 2019 after the regional election. ==Investiture== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:98%;" |- ! colspan="2" width="275px"| Ballot → ! colspan="2"| 12 July 2019 ! colspan="2"| 15 July 2019 |- ! colspan="2"| Required majority → | colspan="2"| 23 out of 45 | colspan="2"| Simple |- ! width="1px" style="background:;"| | align="left"| | | | | |- ! style="background:gray;"| | align="left"| | colspan="2"| | colspan="2"| |- | align="left" colspan="8"| Sources |} ==Composition== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:97%;" |- | colspan="4" bgcolor="#F2F2F2" align="center" | ← Barbón government → (24 July 2019 – present) |- ! Office ! Name !
